::Balcknightmare/Darkfate::

"Blacknightmare to Darkfate" said the transmetal
reaven "I see a new bot around the target..."

"Stay in your place an see, Reaven" Answered Darkfate
"Soon I'll be there"


--- THECODE <thecode@...> wrote:
> Deemos watches the pistol carefully.
> 
> Deemos: When is violence needed? Shouldn't we be
> banning together to get rid of violence? The world
> should be peaceful, with the Mafia as it's rulers,
> don't you agree? Now then, surely you would want to
> come with us, so come on in, we could always use
> another...
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Alloran2@... 
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Monday, November 13, 2000 8:59 PM
>   Subject: The Godfather
> 
> 
>   :::Godfather::: 
> 
>   ::A stasis pod landed by the Alliance base.  The
> scanners were damaged, so no 
>   alternate mode was created.  A tall and fat robot
> climed out.  He sees 
>   Deemos' group and walks up to them.  Seeing that
> Deemos looks like the 
>   leader, he addresses him:: 
>   Godfather: Yo dude.  You leader of this group? 
>   ::he says, looking at the rest of the Chosen
> Mafia.  he takes out his pistol:: 
>   Godfather: Now im gonna make you an offer you
> cannot refuse.  May i join ya? 
>         eGroups Sponsor 
>        
>
